sp: Get sitelen pona of a toki pona phrase
sp-text: The phrase you want to convert to sitelen pona.
sp-font: The font you want to use (overrides your settings)
sp-fontsize: The size of font you want to use (overrides your settings)
sp-color: The font color you want to use (overrides your settings)
sp-spoiler: Whether or not to hide the image with a spoiler
sitelenpona: Get sitelen pona of a toki pona phrase
sitelenpona-text: The phrase you want to convert to sitelen pona.
sitelenpona-font: The font you want to use (overrides your settings)
sitelenpona-fontsize: The size of font you want to use (overrides your settings)
sitelenpona-color: The font color you want to use (overrides your settings)
sitelenpona-spoiler: Whether or not to hide the image with a spoiler
ss: Get the sitelen sitelen of a toki pona phrase
ss-text: The phrase you want to convert to sitelen sitelen.
ss-fontsize: The size of font you want to use (overrides your settings)
ss-color: The font color you want to use (overrides your settings)
ss-spoiler: Whether or not to hide the image with a spoiler
sitelensitelen: Get the sitelen sitelen of a toki pona phrase
sitelensitelen-text: The phrase you want to convert to sitelen sitelen.
sitelensitelen-fontsize: The size of font you want to use (overrides your settings)
sitelensitelen-color: The font color you want to use (overrides your settings)
sitelensitelen-spoiler: Whether or not to hide the image with a spoiler
prefs-fontsize: Set the font size that sitelen pona will be displayed as
prefs-fontsize-invalid: The fontsize ***{}*** is not in the range 14 to 500.
prefs-fontsize-pref-invalid: The fontsize ***{}*** is in your preferences but is not valid. Setting the default; please try again.
prefs-fontsize-option: The font size you want to use.
prefs-font: Choose the font that sitelen pona will be displayed as
prefs-font-pref-invalid: The font ***{}*** is in your preferences but is not available. Assigning the default; please try again.
prefs-font-option: The font you want to use.
prefs-color: Set the text color that /sp and other commands will use
prefs-color-invalid: The color ***{}*** must be a hexadecimal RGB color e.g. `2288ff`
prefs-color-pref-invalid: The color ***{}*** is in your preferences but is not valid. Setting the default; please try again.
prefs-color-option: The text color you want to use.
